kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=petstore_session, url=https://petstore.swagger.io/v2, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user path_url=/v2/user headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '201'} body=b'{"id": "20250808001", "username": "Suphittt", "firstName": "Suphitcha", "lastName": "Thanakhamma", "email": "ssufortest@gmail.com", "password": "testerssu123", "phone": "0612345678", "userStatus": "1"}'

Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#tls-warnings warnings.warn(

test.name: Test Cases 001

kw.name: เปิดหน้าเว็บ SauceDemo
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
ขั้นตอนที่ 1: เข้าหน้าแรกของที่ https://www.saucedemo.com/

kw.name: ใส่ชื่อผู้ใช้งาน
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
ขั้นตอนที่ 2: ใส่ Username: standard_user

kw.name: ใส่รหัสผ่าน
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
ขั้นตอนที่ 3: ใส่ Password: secret_sauce

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
